text: int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { long long int a [ 100000 ] ; long long int i , n , count = 0 , n1 = 1 ; scanf ( "%lld" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%lld" , & a [ i ] ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n - 1 ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] < a [ i + 1 ] ) n1 ++ ; else { count += ( ( n1 * n1 ) / 2 ) - ( n1 / 2 ) ; n1 = 1 ; } } count += ( ( n1 * n1 ) / 2 ) - ( n1 / 2 ) ; printf ( "%lld\n" , count + n ) ; } return 0 ; }
